text:
Seed Scientific | NYC | http://seedscientific.com/

Seed solves big problems with big data. We architect data-driven, technology-based solutions to a wide range of complex problems for global clients in the commercial, public, and social sectors -- like GE and the United Nations.

We're growing fast and hiring ASAP for several FT positions:

Front End Developers Data Engineers Design Technologists Data Scientists

You'll have direct impact on the solutions we design for our clients. You'll build and deploy custom data-driven tools, visualizations and platforms. And you'll collaborate with an interdisciplinary group of scientists, mathematicians, designers, and engineers.

If this sounds interesting or if you have any questions, email manuel@seedscientific.com.

No remote work at this time.

http://seedscientific.theresumator.com/apply/
